item.title: Why most QA Automation Fails
item.description: Overview Recently, I made a poll on what would be my next blog post topic, and a lot of my network is interested in what I view as major reasons that most QA Automation endeavors fail: Given that I spent a significant amount of my time in my early career doing SDET work, as well as beginning to develop an understanding the benefit of having a DevOps based culture within IT organizations, this post will discuss my conclusions as to what I feel makes for a failed automation effort.
